name: Fista Fight (2019)
description:
All your favorites from Fista are here! Matt, Keith, Tony, Steve & Chris! Everybody got too drunk again and it's time to fight!

2 Player game only.

Fista Fight is the 2nd game in the YouTube video. Start at 0:14 to see it.

This game wasn't created by us but created in Unity by Fista superfan, Abdul!

Check out the first game in the video "Guys Night: The Destruction of Keith's Living Room" HERE.

Follow us on YouTube, Instagram, & Facebook.
